description: Verify that the system test dashboard loads correctly with proper authentication
scenario: Admin user navigates to the system test dashboard to view test management overview
expected_results: Display the system test dashboard with header, summary statistics, module overview, failed tests, and quick actions
procedure:
1. Log in as admin user
2. Navigate to /admin/system-test/dashboard or /admin/system-test/
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check header with 'System Test Dashboard' title
5. Verify navigation buttons 'View All Tests' and 'New Test Plan' are visible

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the system test dashboard
scenario: Regular user attempts to access the system test management functionality
expected_results: Access should be denied with 403 Forbidden error
procedure:
1. Log in as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/system-test/dashboard
3. Verify 403 Forbidden error is returned
4. Check redirect to appropriate error page
5. Ensure no test management functionality is accessible

description: Verify that summary statistics cards display accurate test counts and data
scenario: Admin views the statistics section to understand overall test status and progress
expected_results: Display four statistics cards showing Total Tests, Passed Tests, Failed Tests, and Pending Tests with accurate counts
procedure:
1. Navigate to system test dashboard as admin
2. Verify 'Total Tests' card shows correct count from test_summary.total_tests
3. Check 'Passed Tests' card displays green styling and correct passed count
4. Confirm 'Failed Tests' card shows red styling and failed count
5. Verify 'Pending Tests' card displays yellow styling and pending count

description: Verify that statistics cards display proper visual styling and icons
scenario: Admin reviews the visual presentation of test statistics for clear communication
expected_results: Statistics cards have proper shadows, borders, icons, and color coding with hover effects
procedure:
1. Check each statistics card has rounded corners and shadow
2. Verify border-left colors: blue (total), green (passed), red (failed), yellow (pending)
3. Confirm appropriate Bootstrap icons for each card
4. Test hover effects on cards (shadow enhancement)
5. Verify dark mode compatibility for all styling

description: Verify the module overview table displays test data by module correctly
scenario: Admin reviews test progress across different system modules to identify areas needing attention
expected_results: Display table with module names, total tests, passed/failed counts, and progress indicators
procedure:
1. Locate 'Module Test Overview' section
2. Verify table headers: Module, Total, Passed, Failed, Progress
3. Check each module row displays correct test counts
4. Confirm module names are clickable links to module details
5. Verify progress indicators show appropriate colors and percentages

description: Verify the empty state display when no test modules are available
scenario: Admin views dashboard when no test plans have been created yet
expected_results: Display empty state message with inbox icon and link to create first test plan
procedure:
1. Ensure no test modules exist in system
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify empty state shows inbox icon
4. Check message 'No test modules found'
5. Confirm 'Create your first test plan' link is present and functional

description: Verify the failed tests section displays tests requiring attention
scenario: Admin reviews failed tests to understand what issues need to be addressed
expected_results: Display failed tests with test plan numbers, module names, failure reasons, and priority badges
procedure:
1. Locate 'Failed Tests' section with red header
2. Verify failed tests display test_plan_no and module_name
3. Check failure_reason is shown (truncated if long)
4. Confirm priority badges display with appropriate colors
5. Verify execute/retry links are present for each failed test

description: Verify the display when no failed tests exist in the system
scenario: Admin views failed tests section when all tests are passing
expected_results: Display success state with check-circle icon and positive message
procedure:
1. Ensure no failed tests exist in system
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify green check-circle icon is displayed
4. Check message 'No failed tests! All tests are passing.'
5. Confirm positive styling and messaging

description: Verify the quick actions section provides easy access to common test management tasks
scenario: Admin uses quick actions to efficiently navigate to key test management functions
expected_results: Display four action buttons for Create Test Plan, Bulk Import, Run Pending Tests, and Generate Report
procedure:
1. Locate 'Quick Actions' section
2. Verify 'Create Test Plan' button with plus-circle icon (blue)
3. Check 'Bulk Import' button with upload icon (green)
4. Confirm 'Run Pending Tests' button with play-circle icon (yellow)
5. Verify 'Generate Report' button with file-earmark-text icon (purple)

description: Verify that quick action buttons navigate to correct destinations
scenario: Admin clicks each quick action button to verify proper routing and functionality
expected_results: Each quick action button navigates to the appropriate page or function
procedure:
1. Click 'Create Test Plan' and verify navigation to test plan creation form
2. Click 'Bulk Import' and verify navigation to bulk import page
3. Click 'Run Pending Tests' and verify navigation to pending tests filtered list
4. Click 'Generate Report' and verify navigation to reports page
5. Confirm all links use proper URL routing

description: Verify the recent test activity section displays latest test executions
scenario: Admin reviews recent test activity to monitor testing progress and execution history
expected_results: Display table with recent test executions including test details, status, and execution information
procedure:
1. Locate 'Recent Test Activity' section (if recent_tests exist)
2. Verify table shows recent test executions
3. Check test plan information is displayed correctly
4. Confirm execution dates and status are shown
5. Verify proper sorting by most recent activity

description: Verify the page header contains proper title, description, and navigation buttons
scenario: Admin reviews dashboard header for clear navigation and context
expected_results: Display header with title, description, and action buttons for viewing tests and creating new plans
procedure:
1. Check page title 'System Test Dashboard' is displayed prominently
2. Verify description 'Monitor and manage system test execution'
3. Confirm 'View All Tests' button navigates to test plans list
4. Check 'New Test Plan' button navigates to creation form
5. Verify buttons have proper styling and icons

description: Verify proper error handling when dashboard data cannot be loaded
scenario: Dashboard encounters an error while loading test data from the database
expected_results: Display appropriate error handling with 500 error page
procedure:
1. Simulate database connection error
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify error is logged properly
4. Check 500 error page is displayed
5. Confirm no sensitive information is exposed to user

description: Verify the dashboard auto-refreshes every 5 minutes to show current data
scenario: Admin leaves dashboard open to monitor ongoing test execution and system changes
expected_results: Page automatically refreshes every 5 minutes to display latest test data
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard and note current time
2. Wait for 5 minutes without user interaction
3. Verify page automatically refreshes
4. Check that updated data is displayed
5. Confirm refresh occurs without user intervention

description: Verify the dashboard displays correctly on different screen sizes and devices
scenario: Admin accesses dashboard from various devices to ensure responsive design functionality
expected_results: Responsive layout adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop with proper element stacking and grid behavior
procedure:
1. View dashboard on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Test on tablet view (768px width)
3. Check mobile view (375px width)
4. Verify statistics cards stack properly on smaller screens
5. Confirm tables scroll horizontally when needed

description: Verify the dashboard displays correctly in both light and dark themes
scenario: Admin switches between light and dark modes to ensure proper theming support
expected_results: All dashboard elements display with appropriate colors and contrast in both light and dark themes
procedure:
1. View dashboard in light mode
2. Switch to dark mode (if theme toggle available)
3. Verify all text remains readable with proper contrast
4. Check statistics cards use appropriate dark theme colors
5. Confirm icons and buttons adapt to theme correctly

description: Verify the dashboard loads within acceptable time limits with proper performance
scenario: Admin navigates to dashboard and measures loading performance with various data volumes
expected_results: Dashboard loads completely within 3 seconds with all data and components rendered properly
procedure:
1. Clear browser cache and cookies
2. Navigate to /admin/system-test/dashboard
3. Measure page load time from request to complete render
4. Verify all statistics load without delay
5. Check performance with large numbers of test plans

description: Verify that all statistics and counts displayed on dashboard are accurate
scenario: Admin compares dashboard statistics with actual test data to ensure accuracy
expected_results: All displayed counts and statistics match the actual test plan data in the database
procedure:
1. Count actual test plans in database by status
2. Compare with dashboard statistics display
3. Verify module overview counts match actual module data
4. Check failed tests list matches actual failed test records
5. Confirm all calculations are accurate

description: Verify proper handling of failed tests list when there are many failed tests
scenario: Dashboard displays failed tests with appropriate limiting and pagination for large numbers
expected_results: Failed tests section shows first 10 tests with link to view all if more exist
procedure:
1. Create more than 10 failed tests in system
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify only first 10 failed tests are displayed
4. Check 'View all X failed tests' link appears
5. Confirm link navigates to filtered test list

description: Verify that module names in overview table link to module-specific test views
scenario: Admin clicks on module names to view detailed test information for specific modules
expected_results: Module name links navigate to module-specific test listing with proper filtering
procedure:
1. Locate module names in overview table
2. Click on a module name link
3. Verify navigation to module-specific URL
4. Check that module tests page loads correctly
5. Confirm proper filtering by module name

description: Verify proper display when test statistics show zero values
scenario: Dashboard displays correctly when there are no tests or all counts are zero
expected_results: Zero values display properly without errors or formatting issues
procedure:
1. Clear all test plans from system
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Verify all statistics show 0 without errors
4. Check that zero values are formatted correctly
5. Confirm empty states display appropriately

description: Verify dashboard works correctly across different web browsers
scenario: Admin accesses dashboard using various browsers to ensure cross-browser compatibility
expected_results: Dashboard displays and functions correctly in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
procedure:
1. Test dashboard in Google Chrome (latest version)
2. Verify functionality in Mozilla Firefox
3. Check display and features in Safari (if available)
4. Test in Microsoft Edge browser
5. Confirm all interactive elements work in each browser

description: Verify dashboard meets accessibility standards for screen readers and keyboard navigation
scenario: Admin and accessibility tools test dashboard for compliance with accessibility standards
expected_results: Dashboard is fully accessible via keyboard navigation and screen readers
procedure:
1. Navigate entire dashboard using only keyboard (Tab, Enter, arrows)
2. Test with screen reader for proper content reading
3. Verify focus indicators are visible on all interactive elements
4. Check color contrast meets accessibility standards
5. Confirm alt text is present for icons and images

description: Verify failed test failure reasons are displayed correctly with proper truncation
scenario: Admin reviews failed tests to understand specific failure reasons and details
expected_results: Failure reasons display with appropriate truncation for long messages and proper formatting
procedure:
1. Create failed tests with various failure reason lengths
2. Navigate to dashboard failed tests section
3. Verify short failure reasons display completely
4. Check long failure reasons are truncated (50 characters + '...')
5. Confirm truncation doesn't break formatting

description: Verify priority badges display correctly for failed tests with appropriate colors
scenario: Admin reviews failed test priorities to understand which issues are most critical
expected_results: Priority badges display with correct colors and text for low, medium, high, and critical priorities
procedure:
1. Create failed tests with different priority levels
2. Navigate to dashboard failed tests section
3. Verify priority badges display correctly
4. Check color coding matches priority levels
5. Confirm badge text is readable and properly formatted

description: Verify dashboard animations and transitions enhance user experience
scenario: Admin observes dashboard loading animations and hover effects for smooth user experience
expected_results: Smooth animations for page loading and hover transitions on interactive elements
procedure:
1. Navigate to dashboard and observe fade-in animations
2. Test hover effects on statistics cards
3. Check button hover transitions
4. Verify animations don't interfere with functionality
5. Confirm animations are smooth and professional

description: Verify the 'Generate Report' link in module overview navigates correctly
scenario: Admin clicks report generation link to access detailed test reporting functionality
expected_results: Report link navigates to reports page with proper context and data
procedure:
1. Locate 'Generate Report' link in module overview section
2. Click the report link
3. Verify navigation to system test reports page
4. Check that reports page loads with appropriate data
5. Confirm link styling and icon display correctly

description: Verify dashboard URL routing works correctly with proper admin authentication
scenario: Admin accesses dashboard through various URL paths to ensure routing consistency
expected_results: Both /admin/system-test/ and /admin/system-test/dashboard URLs work correctly
procedure:
1. Navigate directly to /admin/system-test/ URL
2. Verify dashboard loads correctly
3. Navigate to /admin/system-test/dashboard URL
4. Check both URLs show same dashboard content
5. Confirm admin authentication is maintained for both routes

description: Verify dashboard memory usage remains reasonable with large datasets
scenario: Dashboard performance with hundreds of test plans to ensure memory efficiency
expected_results: Dashboard maintains reasonable memory usage even with large numbers of test plans
procedure:
1. Create system with 500+ test plans across multiple modules
2. Navigate to dashboard and monitor memory usage
3. Check that page loads without memory issues
4. Verify all statistics calculate correctly with large datasets
5. Confirm no memory leaks occur during auto-refresh

description: Verify dashboard integrates properly with all test management functionality
scenario: Admin uses dashboard as central hub for accessing all test management features
expected_results: Dashboard provides seamless integration and navigation to all test management functions
procedure:
1. Use dashboard to navigate to test creation
2. Access test execution from failed tests section
3. Navigate to module details from overview table
4. Access bulk import from quick actions
5. Verify all integrations work seamlessly and maintain context
